title: All Praise To Our Redeeming Lord
author: Charles Wesley (1707-1788) bio

v1: All praise to our redeeming Lord,
Who joins us by His grace,
And bids us, each to each restored,
v2: He bids us build each other up;
To our high calling's glorious hope,
We hand in hand go on,
We hand in hand go on.
v3: The gift which He on one bestows,
The grace through every vessel flows
v4: We all partake the joy of one;
A peace to worldly minds unknown,
v5: What height of rapture shall we know,
